detail_desc: Leggings in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. High waist with concealed elastication and a concealed zip at the hems.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Short top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves and a deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery text print. Decorative tie detail at the hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist, a high slit at the front and an overlocked hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, wide ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Acetate earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 4.6 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Checked coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a round collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce. Unlined.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed cotton and viscose blend with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes.
Cotton poplin blouse with a collar, V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist, and buttoned cuffs.
Short, sleeveless dress in sequined mesh with spaghetti shoulder straps and sequined fringes at the hem. Jersey lining.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective details and elasticated cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with wide elastication at the back of the waist, a wide sewn-on tie belt at the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front, a low-cut back and narrow straps that cross at the back. Small metal decoration on one shoulder strap.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a twisted detail at the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

3-piece fancy dress costume in soft jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood, sewn-on, decorative trims in woven fabric and a print motif front and back. Trousers with an elasticated waist and print motif at the hems. Face mask with a hook and loop fastening at the back.

Winter running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details. Legs with windproof sections, mesh sections at the knees and on the inside, and a zip at the hems. Brushed thermal inside.

V-neck playsuit in a glittery-patterned viscose weave with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Short sleeves with a frill that continues down the sides, an elasticated seam with a drawstring and frill at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
Wide jersey top in a soft cotton and modal blend with embroidery and long, wide sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Poncho-cut dress in printed viscose jersey with a drawstring at the waist and sewn-together sides with armholes at the top.
Round-necked dress in textured jersey containing glittery threads. Buttons at the back, cap sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and slim legs.
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the waist and hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a seam and wide flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the top. The flounce continues around the back, creating short, flounced sleeves.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and a slightly shorter front with a tie detail at the hem.
Shopper in mesh made from recycled polyester with two handles in imitation leather and a zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Depth 14 cm. Height 31 cm. Width 40 cm.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with a scalloped edge around the brim and ties under the chin. Lined.

Chimi x H&M. A retro-inspired shirt that is perfect for both trips to the beach and rooftop parties in town. Straight-cut in an airy linen, viscose and cotton weave, this short-sleeved shirt has a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back to create room for movement. It also has an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Available in two summery pastel shades.
Block-coloured shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in one side and straight-cut legs with seams at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a reversible sequin motif (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal tiara with sparkly glass and plastic stones.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Playsuit in a viscose crêpe weave with long puff sleeves. Deep V-neck, a loose, wrapover section at the front with ties at one side and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Soft jersey vest tops.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, open-back top in a soft, fine knit in a narrow cut at the top with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back. Decorative crossover straps and ties at the back of the hem.
Trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waistband, fake fly, diagonal front pockets and fake back pockets.

Playsuit in woven fabric with decorative lace trims, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated waist. Smocking at the back, side pockets and short legs. Lined at the top.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Adjustable belt in imitation leather with a detachable bag that has a flap with a decorative metal buckle and concealed magnetic fastener. Lined. Depth 3 cm. Height 9 cm. Width 17 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with woven stripes. Collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and short cap sleeves with a drawstring at the top. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with crossover flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Elastication at the top to make the swimsuit easy to put on and take off.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, fake welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in soft, lustrous jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a gently draped neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in a soft, organic cotton double weave with elastication at the waist, crossover straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Boxy-style top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Ribbed trim with a contrasting colour stripe around the neckline, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal rings in various designs, two decorated with a pearly bead.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with metal beads and a small hammered metal pendant. Length 4 cm.
Puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the waist and hems. One patterned pair.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
